skills.Name: Polearm Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 4.5 when using a polearm.

skills.Name: Light Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 4.2 and Evasion by 3 when equipped with light armor.

skills.Name: Heavy Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 3.3 when equipped with heavy armor.

skills.Name: Fast HP Recovery
skills.Description: Increases HP Recovery Bonus by 1.1.

skills.Name: Enrage
skills.Description: You won't give up, becoming enraged. Heal 10% of total HP..

skills.Name: Power Crush
skills.Description: Attacks the enemy with 650 Power added to P. Atk. Over-hit. Critical.

skills.Name: Cursed Pierce
skills.Description: Attacks the enemy dealing 740 Physical Damage. Over-hit. Ignores Shield Defense. Critical is possible.

skills.Name: Whirlwind
skills.Description: Swings a spear to attack nearby enemies dealing 460 Physical Damage. Requires a polearm to be equipped. Ignores Shield Defense. Over-hit. Critical.

skills.Name: Thunder Storm
skills.Description: Swings a spear to attack nearby enemies with 100 Power added to P. Atk. and causes Stun for 5 seconds. Requires a polearm to be equipped. Ignores Shield Defense. Over-hit. Critical.

skills.Name: Heavy Armor Mastery
skills.Description: Increases P. Def. by 3.3 when equipped with heavy armor.

skills.Name: Final Frenzy
skills.Description: Increases P. Atk. by 32.9 when HP is below 30%.

skills.Name: Boost HP
skills.Description: Increases Max HP by 60.
